name: listChangeDelims
description:
Changes a list delimiter.
 Returns a copy of the list, with each delimiter character
 replaced by new_delimiter.

params.name: list
params.description: A list or a variable that contains one.

params.name: new_delimiter
params.description: Delimiter string or a variable that contains one. Can be an empty string. ColdFusion processes the string as one delimiter.

params.name: delimiters
params.description: A string or a variable that contains one. Characters that separate list elements. The default value is comma. If this parameter contains more than one character, ColdFusion processes each occurrence of each character as a delimiter.

params.name: includeEmptyValues
params.description: CF10+ Set to yes to include empty values.

examples.title: Simple Example
examples.description: Changes the delimiters in the list

examples.title: Example with Custom Delimiter
examples.description: Changes the delimiters in the list using a custom delimiter
